messages.subject: OT Traveling: Looking for ppl who live in the TN, AR, MO, KY areas
messages.msgSnippet: Group, All of us (4 of us, DW, dd1 (almost 6) and dd2 (4.5) are going on a week-long vacation to that area.  Aaaaaannnnnddd, we re looking for stuff to do,
messages.messageBody:
Group,

All of us (4 of us, DW, dd1 (almost 6) and dd2 (4.5) are going on a
week-long vacation to that area. Aaaaaannnnnddd, we're looking for stuff to
do, places to go, and also suggestions for a place to stay. If there's
anyone in the area who would like to meet up and/or lend a room for a
night? We're doing this on the cheap, so any suggestions would be helpful.
We are looking through the net and various other services, but there's
nothing like first-hand knowledge.

We'll be in the area roughly Sunday-ish on through Thursday or Friday. But
we must be in Waterloo, IL on Saturday. Any suggestions?

Please reply directly to me. Thanks for your time.

--Rob Saxon
DH to Seana for 10 years
"Daddy!" to Genevieve (almost 6!) and Elissa (4.5)


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
